intro.title: Projects
intro.description: Welcome to the Varga Foundation docs. We build and support open-source solutions for data and AI that are accessible, ethical, and community-driven.

nexberos/index.title: Nexberos — Auth & Federation for Data/AI
nexberos/index.description: Nexberos provides authentication and federation building blocks tailored for modern data/AI platforms. Goal: simple, secure integration that works well with common tools.

rivio/index.title: Rivio — Data Ingestion and Governance
rivio/index.description: Rivio is a set of tools to orchestrate data ingestion, quality, and governance with a strong focus on lineage, reproducibility, and accessibility.

vorath/compatibility.title: Version compatibility
vorath/compatibility.description: This page lists recommended versions of Kubernetes, CSI components, and Hadoop/HDFS for this driver.

vorath/configuration.title: Configuration
vorath/configuration.description: The driver reads its configuration from environment variables and/or a ConfigMap/Secret injected via Helm.

vorath/examples.title: Examples
vorath/examples.description: This page provides ready-to-use YAML manifests to test the HDFS CSI driver.

vorath/index.title: Vorath — HDFS CSI for Kubernetes
vorath/index.description: Vorath is a CSI plugin that lets Kubernetes workloads mount HDFS volumes through the standard CSI interface. It aims for a simple installation experience, sensible defaults, and smooth production operations.

vorath/installation-deployment.title: Installation and deployment
vorath/installation-deployment.description: This page describes how to install the HDFS CSI driver on Kubernetes using Helm. You can use published images or build

vorath/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
vorath/troubleshooting.description: Common symptoms, likely causes, and remediation steps.

weave/index.title: Weave — Orchestrating Data/AI Workflows
weave/index.description: Weave is a modular toolkit to orchestrate data and AI workflows. It helps you compose reproducible, observable, and portable steps.
